encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Vincenzo Damiani 2018-10-15: "Added orthographic regularizations"; Julia Lougovaya-Ast 2017-05-15: "Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Delete record in 'Display name,' move the title from 'Legacy' to 'Display name'; add 'epic' to the 'Genre.' In 'Keywords', record 'poetry' and 'epic' in two separate fields. Add CWKB: 927 for Homer, 2815 for the Iliad. Under 'script' change to 'sloping capital cursive' (cf. Turner-Parsons no. 66); add dimensions: 7 cm width, 9 cm height; record MP no. which is 0851.01. In the text, give regularized readings in lines 13, 16, and 19, and comment on the rho in the beginning of line 17, which cannot be easily accounted for."

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Vincenzo Damiani 2018-10-15: "Added orthographic regularizations"; Julia Lougovaya-Ast 2017-05-15: "Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Delete record in 'Display name,' move the title from 'Legacy' to 'Display name'; add 'epic' to the 'Genre.' In 'Keywords', record 'poetry' and 'epic' in two separate fields. Add CWKB: 927 for Homer, 2815 for the Iliad. Under 'script' change to 'sloping capital cursive' (cf. Turner-Parsons no. 66); add dimensions: 7 cm width, 9 cm height; record MP no. which is 0851.01. In the text, give regularized readings in lines 13, 16, and 19, and comment on the rho in the beginning of line 17, which cannot be easily accounted for."
Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2018.05.01 by Thomas Backhuys. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: "text according to edition"

bibl.title: Studies in the Text and Transmission of the Iliad.
